descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Embark on a fantastical journey through the vibrant ecosystems of the Amazon and Tongass with Unearthed. Prepare to be whisked away on a funny, narrative-driven adventure. 

Unearthed is an impactful experience grounded in scientific research which has been modelled on the food chain within two distinct biomes. This virtual world reflects the real and incredible world of plants, animals, and ecosystems; empowering you to learn through play. 

Guiding you through this immersive journey are two quirky robot companions, Hazzi and Penni, voiced by Richard Ayoade and Sian Clifford. Together, they'll assist you in unravelling the wonders of nature as you strive to rescue the esteemed Professor, portrayed by Indira Varma, and ultimately, save the world!

Features include:

⛰️ 2 unique biomes: Amazon and Tongass, crafted with scientific precision, and your cutting-edge Laboratory

🐠 6 captivating levels exploring a different part of the food chain

🐾 Unlock 2 playable animals with super power mechanics to aid in your quest

🔍 Discover and learn about 80+ real plants and animals, each with unique characteristics and behaviours

🍄 Immerse yourself in engaging stories and dialogue that seamlessly blend entertainment with education

🌳 Stylised plants, trees, and animals modelled on those found in the real world

Set out on a journey where entertainment meets education, and adventure meets authenticity. Are you ready to unleash the explorer within and embark on an unforgettable quest?
